description: The only officially certified ghost in Castle Burgeck, armed with his rusty rattling chain. Once a knight named Balduin, he was cursed to become the ghost Hui Buh after being caught cheating in a card game by one of his enraged fellow players.
taunt_1: Hui Buuuh! Hui Buuuuh! Huui Buuuuuuh!
taunt_2: I will dance on his head like the ghastly avenger, pulling his hair until he can neither hear nor see!
taunt_3: You can expect a fright tonight!
taunt_4: I will grow myself really big as I did with greedy Count Ottokar!
anger_1: Ow! Such disrespect! For 400 years, I've been the ghost here, and no one has ever slammed the door on me!
plead: Do people really need to know this?
nervous_1: Ha Ha Huapchi! I caught a cold.
nervous_2: Ha Ha Huapchi! I caught a cold.
victory_1: I always wriggle out of trouble on my own.
victory_2: Did you hear that, castellan? This man, without crown, scepter, or robe, claims to be a king? Oh, let me not laugh too loudly!
victory_3: Hui Buuuuuuuuh! Was that spooky enough?
victory_4: Hui Buuuuuuuuh! Was that spooky enough?
request: I have a ghostly stomach growl, a frightening hunger.
ally_death: Oh dear, oh dear, I have failed. I think I should have used my latest trick where I grow huge and tiny at the same time. Well, I'll just scare the next guest with it.
congrats: Where did I put my book, where did I put my book, 'Spooking Made Easy for Everyone?' Ah, here... this dust! Now, let's see.
boast: Hui Buuuuuuuuh! Was that spooky enough?
help: It's terrible! What I feared the most has finally happened.
siege: Shall I sneak up on him and give him a good pinch on the bum?
no_attack_1: Too bad, too bad. I've already vanished, but isn't there another night tomorrow?
no_attack_2: Too bad, too bad. I've already vanished, but isn't there another night tomorrow?
no_sent: Don't you dare snack on my things!... Hui Buh!
help_sent: Let them come, then there will finally be some proper haunting!
will_attack: Shall I sneak up on him and give him a good pinch on the bum?
